Detailed Description

Context feature handle executes a context feature on behalf of the key manager
See also:
KeyManager

Member Function Documentation

void ContextFeatureHandle::Execute (  AtlApplication *  context_app = 0  )  const [virtual]
 

Retrieves the context feature from the feature broker and executes it, after feature-using application or plugin has set the context item, and feature-providing application or plugin has checked the state of the Feature.

Parameters:
context_app feature-providing application or plugin

Reimplemented from FeatureHandle.
